stimulusHtml: The artist who created the female deity figure from Nukuoro achieved a smooth, glossy surface by

features.html: Â© Werner Forman Archive/The Bridgeman Art Library

choicesHtml: finishing the carved surface of the figure by polishing it with pumice rock
using a lost-wax casting technique to create a figure made from solid metal
fusing a mineral paste to the surface of the figure by firing at a high temperature
applying slip to the modeled figure and firing it using an oxygen-reduction technique
